copy: Skup is a leading provider in educational resources, themes, and apps for entrepreneurs on Shopify. I lead efforts to develop powerful and user friendly themes that help our customers find the most success when starting and growing their Shopify stores.
SAIO is an eCommerce agency centering on the development of Shopify stores and apps. My role focuses on Frontend development and building apps with Node.js and Rails.

While working in other fields, I developed a strong interest and skill set in web development. I found a lot of joy in helping others to create, modernize, and optimize their websites. I love providing solutions to technological challenges and assisting clients to reach their goals. Now, as a freelance web developer, I’ve created and enhanced over 20 websites.
